page.title: 02GAZETTEER
page.content: THIS GAZETTEER IS A BRIEF GUIDE TO THE VILLAGE OF CEFN MEIRIADOG.THIS AREA IS BOUNDED TO THE NORTH BY THE COASTAL PLAIN,AND TO THE SOUTH BY THE VALLEY OF THE RIVER ELWY.CEFN AND GROESFFORDD MARLI,AT THE SOUTH END AND NORTH END OF THE PARISH,RESPECTIVELY { {PLACES OF {WORSHIP}-C.M.CHAPEL,SINAN,ST.MARY'S {FARMS}-MEDIUM SIZE FARMS-SHEEP,CATTLE AND ARABLE {HOUSES}-SOME OLD STONE COTTAGES,COUNCIL HOUSING,MANOR HOUSES {EDUCATION}-CP SCHOOL.VP SCHOOL(CLOSED 1978) {SEVICES}-WATER WORKS,POST OFFICE
